Package imusim :: Package trajectories :: Module splined :: Class SplinedPositionTrajectory

Class SplinedPositionTrajectory

source code

Trajectory with position obtained by splining a sampled trajectory.

source code 

Initialise trajectory.

Parameters:
  • sampled - position samples (SampledPositionTrajectory)
  • positionStdDev - standard deviation of position samples (float)
  • positionSplineOrder - order of B-spline used for interpolation
